name: The Time Has Come
storyline: Trapped in a mysterious circular room with no exits. The protagonist must come to terms with the tale of a horrific event that seemingly changed everything. Can she escape from the monsters within, or will she become a monster herself?
summary:
The Time Has Come is a solo-dev point and click adventure game project that was created in late evenings after work during the 2 weeks of the $105 Adventure Game Challenge.

The theme of the challenge was: Escape
